# goldminer

This package provides functions to simulate the operation of a gold mine, as
required in the UTS course Data and Decision Making.

## Installation

You can install goldminer from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("perrystephenson/goldminer")
```
